item.title: COP30 brings both hope and letdowns for vulnerable countries
item.description: The UN Climate Conference COP30, held from November 10-21 in Belém, Brazil, concluded with a mix of hope and disappointment.

item.title: Slum fires, inequality and Dhaka’s invisible residents
item.description: The night was torn by orange flames that rose to the sky after another massive fire—the fourth in two years—ripped through the Bou Bazar area of Dhaka's Korail Slum on November 25.

item.title: There's no neutral observers in digital violence
item.description: The instinct is always to look away. A photo of a young woman appears on a Facebook page I never followed, or a screenshot lands in a men-only WhatsApp group filled with winking emojis and crude remarks. The comments turn sexual within minutes.
